task.title: Elastic IP Address Detail
task.shortdesc: This screen shows you the details for an elastic IP address. From this page, you can associate an IP address with an instance, disassociate an IP address from an instance, or release an IP address back to the cloud.

task.title: Actions
task.shortdesc: Clicking the Actions button brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected elastic IP address.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are availabe:

step.cmd: This selection allows you to associate the selected IP address with a running instance.
This selection allows you to disassociate the IP address from an instance.
This item releases the selected IP address back to the cloud.
